sentences.pinyin: zhè shì yī gè huà xué gōng shì.

sentences.simplifiedText: 许多学生觉得理解和记住复杂的数学公式具有挑战性。
sentences.traditionalText: 許多學生覺得理解和記住複雜的數學公式具有挑戰性。
sentences.pinyin: xǔ duō xué shēng jué de lǐ jiě hé jì zhu yù fù zá de shù xué gōng shì jù yǒu tiǎo zhàn xìng.
sentences.translation: Many students find it challenging to understand and memorize complex mathematical formulas.
